item.title: evil-unimpaired.el
item.description: This is a small port of Tim Pope’s unimpaired.vim, which provides overloading of the square bracket keys to many useful functions. My source, originally pulled from Spacemacs, can be found at zmaas/evil-unimpaired

item.title: FStitch
item.description: FStitch FStitch is a tool developed in the Dowell lab at CU boulder for the analysis of high-throughput genomic sequencing data (GRO-seq). I’ve worked on adding small features here and there as well as exploring improvements for more consistent analysis. You can find the original project here, and my development fork here

item.title: .emacs.d
item.description: I keep my emacs configuration published on github. If you’re interested, you can check it out here.
